name: Tactics Of Rewy (#LowRezJam 2020) [Alpha]
description:
Made a quick tactics game to submit something to the game jam. Been too busy this week to actually do anything towards this.

You can use WASD/D-pad, or click on the character, although that doesn't seem to work in HTML for some reason? Game Maker Studio 1 is weirdly breaking on me. 

Still some crashes I don't  understand. Probably my bad code or whatever.

Also, use space to skip a step of your turn. Really helps not attack scary monsters. o.o;;
